team.name: Ally Fekaiki
team.bioHtml: Founder @Juno: wellbeing on-demand

jobs.title: Co-Founder/CTO/Head of Engineering
jobs.description:
We're looking for a CTO/Head of Engineering (potential Co-founder) to join us at Juno on our amazing journey to bring better wellbeing to teams across the world.

This role is equity-only at the beginning, with a salary to follow successful fundraising.

What is Juno? 
Juno is an employee experience marketplace. Companies sign their teams up and team members get to define what wellbeing means to them. On-demand and in one place. From dog-sitting to DIY, HIIT class to Hypnotherapy.

We're looking for an energetic and passionate tech-savvy CTO to join us as we look to scale our existing MVP and help build out the wellbeing platform of the future.

Preferably someone with experience in: 
1. Building marketplaces to ultimately serve over 1 million users 
2. Designing human-centric solutions 
3. Own and lead the vision and roadmap for our tech
4. Ability to code/develop software

What we are looking for:

- A forward-thinking CTO/Head of Engineering keen on pushing the boundaries of a very exciting company within a £400 Billion market 
- Involvement in all future planning and expansion aspects of the company 
- Building affiliate partnerships and relationships to help increase rapid growth
- Help raise capital to gain further traction and expansion 
- Planning, development and testing of the platform 
- Website scraping of data 
- Ideally knowledge of script writing but not mandatory

- Continual improvement of underpinning technology

What you get back:

- An equity stake in the company. (Depending on experience) 
- Seeing the company grow globally becoming a mainstream name within the industry 
- Rapid growth with the company through its global expansion 
- Mirroring the tech model and expanding into multiple markets

About the team: 

Ally Fekaiki - Co-Founder 
Ally has over 10 years of experience in Growth and marketing roles across the tech sector, having grown startups from 0 to 1 million customers on more than one occasion. His passion is the wellbeing of staff. Juno is already having an incredible impact on people's lives and he wants to find a partner that shares the passion to grow that impact.

James Gotz - Co-Founder
James is the current Director of Ventures at impact incubator and accelerator, Allia. James has previously led the the strategic and operational efforts at London-based startup incubator, corporate innovation and technology development lab, Whyable. James has also worked in various back, middle and front office managerial roles, across multiple different industries including fintech, technology, investment banking and more recently early stage investing and blockchain. James is also the Co-Founder of an angel investment group, Network Effect. In addition, James dedicates some of his spare time as a Strategy Advisor to a number of different projects and incubators in the blockchain and technology space.
